data.title: Don Davis
data.meta_description: Donald Romain Davis is an American composer and orchestrator.
data.text: Year Title Notes 1984 Hyperspace 1988 Blackout 1991 Spud [1] 1992 Tiny Toon Adventures: How I Spent My Vacation Composed with Steven Bramson, Bruce Broughton, Albert Lloyd Olson, Richard Stone, Stephen James Taylor and Mark Watters 1993 Session Man 1996 Bound 1997 Warriors of Virtue 1998 The Lesser Evil 1999 The Matrix 1999 Universal Soldier: The Return 1999 House on Haunted Hill 1999 Turbulence 2: Fear of Flying 2001 Antitrust 2001 Valentine 2001 Jurassic Park III Themes by John Williams 2001 The Unsaid 2001 Behind Enemy Lines 2002 Long Time Dead Year Title Episode Notes 1990 Tiny Toon Adventures "You Asked for It" 1990 Tiny Toon Adventures "A Ditch in Time" 1990 Tiny Toon Adventures "Whale's Tales" Composed with William Ross 1991 Tiny Toon Adventures "No Toon Is an Island"
